00011 EagleDbTuple* EagleDbTuple_New(EagleDbTable *table)
00012 {
00013     EagleDbTuple *tuple;
00014     
00015     if(NULL == table) {
00016         return NULL;
00017     }
00018     
00019     tuple = (EagleDbTuple*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleDbTuple_New.1", sizeof(EagleDbTuple));
00020     if(NULL == tuple) {
00021         return NULL;
00022     }
00023     
00024     tuple->table = table;
00025     tuple->data = (void**) EagleMemory_MultiAllocate("EagleDbTuple_New.2", sizeof(void*), EagleDbTable_countColumns(table));
00026     if(NULL == tuple->data) {
00027         EagleDbTuple_Delete(tuple);
00028         return NULL;
00029     }
00030     
00031     return tuple;
00032 }

00034 void EagleDbTuple_Delete(EagleDbTuple *tuple)
00035 {
00036     if(NULL == tuple) {
00037         return;
00038     }
00039     
00040     {
00041         int i;
00042         
00043         if(NULL != tuple->data) {
00044             for(i = 0; i < EagleDbTable_countColumns(tuple->table); ++i) {
00045                 EagleMemory_Free(tuple->data[i]);
00046             }
00047             EagleMemory_Free(tuple->data);
00048         }
00049         
00050         EagleMemory_Free(tuple);
00051     }
00052 }

00054 void EagleDbTuple_setInt(EagleDbTuple *tuple, int position, EagleDataTypeIntegerType value)
00055 {
00056     if(EagleDbTable_getColumn(tuple->table, position)->type != EagleDataTypeInteger) {
00057         EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityError, "Wrong type.");
00058         return;
00059     }
00060     tuple->data[position] = EagleData_Int(value);
00061 }

00072 void EagleDbTuple_setVarchar(EagleDbTuple *tuple, int position, EagleDataTypeVarcharType value)
00073 {
00074     if(EagleDbTable_getColumn(tuple->table, position)->type != EagleDataTypeVarchar) {
00075         EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityError, "Wrong type.");
00076         return;
00077     }
00078     
00079     ((EagleDataTypeVarcharType*) tuple->data)[position] = strdup(value);

00082 EagleBoolean EagleDbTuple_set(EagleDbTuple *tuple, int position, EagleDbSqlValue *v, EagleDataType columnType)
00083 {
00084     EagleBoolean canCast;
00085     
00086     switch(columnType) {
00087             
00088         case EagleDataTypeInteger:
00089         {
00090             EagleDataTypeIntegerType value = EagleDbSqlValue_getInteger(v, &canCast);
00091             EagleDbTuple_setInt(tuple, position, value);
00092             break;
00093         }
00094             
00095         case EagleDataTypeFloat:
00096         {
00097             EagleDataTypeFloatType value = EagleDbSqlValue_getFloat(v, &canCast);
00098             EagleDbTuple_setFloat(tuple, position, value);
00099             break;
00100         }
00101             
00102         case EagleDataTypeVarchar:
00103         {
00104             EagleDataTypeVarcharType value = EagleDbSqlValue_getVarchar(v, &canCast);
00105             EagleDbTuple_setVarchar(tuple, position, value);
00106             break;
00107         }
00108             
00109         case EagleDataTypeUnknown:
00110         {
00111             canCast = EagleFalse;
00112             break;
00113         }
00114             
00115     }
00116     
00117     return canCast;
00118 }

00120 char* EagleDbTuple_toString(EagleDbTuple *tuple)
00121 {
00122     char *desc = (char*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleDbTuple_toString.1", 1024);
00123     int i;
00124     
00125     if(NULL == desc) {
00126         return NULL;
00127     }
00128     
00129     desc[0] = 0;
00130     strcat_safe(desc, "(");
00131     for(i = 0; i < EagleDbTable_countColumns(tuple->table); ++i) {
00132         if(i > 0) {
00133             strcat_safe(desc, ",");
00134         }
00135         strcat_safe(desc, EagleDbTable_getColumn(tuple->table, i)->name);
00136         strcat_safe(desc, "=");
00137         
00138         switch(EagleDbTable_getColumn(tuple->table, i)->type) {
00139                 
00140             case EagleDataTypeUnknown:
00141                 sprintf(desc, "%s?", desc);
00142                 break;
00143                 
00144             case EagleDataTypeInteger:
00145                 sprintf(desc, "%s%d", desc, *(((EagleDataTypeIntegerType**) tuple->data)[i]));
00146                 break;
00147                 
00148             case EagleDataTypeVarchar:
00149                 sprintf(desc, "%s\"%s\"", desc, ((EagleDataTypeVarcharType*) tuple->data)[i]);
00150                 break;
00151                 
00152             case EagleDataTypeFloat:
00153                 sprintf(desc, "%s%g", desc, *(((EagleDataTypeFloatType**) tuple->data)[i]));
00154                 break;
00155                 
00156         }
00157     }
00158     strcat_safe(desc, ")");
00159     
00160     return desc;
